trayOptionsItem.title: Tray Option
trayOptionsItem.description: An object that represents a single tray menu item

action.title: Action
action.description: Action to perform when user clicks this menu item. 'openfilesystem', 'openbrowser', or 'stopserver'

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: Turn menu item grey and nothing happens when clicking on it

image.title: Image
image.description: Path to PNG image to display on menu item next to the label

hotkey.title: Hotkey
hotkey.description: Keyboard shortcut to choose this menu item

path.title: Path
path.description: Filesystem path to open for 'openfilesystem' action

title: CommandBox Server
description: Configuration file for a CommandBox server

openBrowser.title: Open Browser
openBrowser.description: Controls whether browser opens by default when starting server

openBrowserURL.title: Open Browser URL
openBrowserURL.description: Override the URL to open when starting the server

startTimeout.title: Server start timeout
startTimeout.description: The length of time in seconds to wait for the server to start

stopsocket.title: Stop Socket
stopsocket.description: The port the server listens on to receive a stop command

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: Enable debug level logging for server

trace.title: Trace
trace.description: Enable trace level logging for server

console.title: Console
console.description: Start the server in console mode instead of in the background

trayEnable.title: Tray Enable
trayEnable.description: Control whether the server has an associated icon in the system tray

trayicon.title: Tray Icon
trayicon.description: Path to the server's tray icon

trayOptions.title: Tray Options
trayOptions.description: An array of custom menu items to be added to the server's tray menu

heapSize.title: Max Heap Size
heapSize.description: The max heap size of the server

minHeapSize.title: Min Heap Size
minHeapSize.description: The starting heap size for the server

args.title: JVM Arguments
args.description: Ad-hoc JVM args for the server such as -X:name

javaHome.title: Java Home Path
javaHome.description: Path to custom JRE. Default is the one that the CommandBox CLI is using

javaVersion.title: Java Version
javaVersion.description: A Java installation ID. In its entirety, it has the form <version>_<type>_<arch>_<os>_<jvm-implementation>_<release>

host.title: Host
host.description: The default host name of the server

directoryBrowsing.title: Directory Browsing
directoryBrowsing.description: Enables file listing for directories with no welcome file

GZIPEnable.title: GZIP Enable
GZIPEnable.description: Enable GZip compression in HTTP responses

welcomeFiles.title: Welcome Files
welcomeFiles.description: A comma-delimited list of files that you would like CommandBox to look for when a user hits a directory

aliases.title: Aliases
aliases.description: Web aliases for the web server, similar to virtual directories

^(/[^/]+)+$.title: Alias
^(/[^/]+)+$.description: The key is the web-accessible virtual path and the value is the relative or absolute path to the folder the alias points to

errorPages.title: Error Pages
errorPages.description: The error pages that CommandBox servers return. You can have a setting for each status code including a default error page to be used if no other setting applies

^[1-5][0-9]{2}$.title: Error Page
^[1-5][0-9]{2}$.description: The key is the status code integer and the value is a relative (to the web root) path to be loaded for that status code

HTTP.title: HTTP Settings
HTTP.description: Configure the HTTP listener on the server

SSL.title: SSL
SSL.description: Configure the HTTPS listener on the server

AJP.title: AJP
AJP.description: Configure the AJP listener on the server

enable.title: Enable
enable.description: Enable URL Rewrites on this server

config.title: Config
config.description: Path to xml config file or .htaccess

statusPath.title: Tuckey Status Path
statusPath.description: URL path to visit Tuckey status page like '/tuckey-status'

configReloadSeconds.title: Config Reload Seconds
configReloadSeconds.description: Number of seconds to check rewrite config file for changes

enable.title: Enable
enable.description: Enable basic auth for this server

users.title: Users
users.description: Users who can authenticate to basic auth

additionalProperties.title: User
additionalProperties.description: The key is the user name and the value is the password.

logDir.title: Log Directory
logDir.description: The folder path where the servlet out, rewrite, and access log are written to

libDirs.title: Jar lib Directories
libDirs.description: A comma-delimited list of directories from which CommandBox will load JARs

WARPath.title: WAR Path
WARPath.description: Path to a local WAR archive or exploded WAR folder.  Mutually exclusive with cfengine.

cfengine.title: CFML Engine
cfengine.description: An Endpoint ID that resolves to a CF engine such as 'adobe' or 'lucee'. Include version as 'adobe@2016'

restMappings.title: REST Mappings
restMappings.description: Comma delimited list of paths to map to the CF engine's REST servlet such as '/rest/*,/api/*'

serverHomeDirectory.title: Server Home Directory
serverHomeDirectory.description: Path to folder where the server WAR will be expanded

runwar.title: Configure RunWar
runwar.description: These settings apply to the underlying Runwar library that starts servers

args.title: Arguments
args.description: Ad-hoc options for the underlying Runwar library
